settings.code:
What type of person is "The Dandy And Unique"?

He's the type of person you'd find standing out because of his unconventional taste and undeniable aura. But more than that, he's that person who follows his intuition even if no one else has done it before. Give him something he won't expect to receive from this list of gift suggestions.

settings.subtitle: As an advocate
settings.title: YOU MIGHT LIKE THIS COLLECTION
settings.text: Use this section to easily call attention to one of your collections. We'll show photos of the first 5 products.
